summary: Tested showcase module fallback/default content feature. Backend seed_showcase_defaults() successfully seeds banners and media player items on startup. Both BannerCarousel and MediaPlayer components render correctly on the MosaicCommunityLanding layout with seeded default content. All CRUD operations (create/delete banners and media items) work correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 Not Found - auth endpoint is at /api/auth-v2/login instead
minor.note: Provided credentials admin@chipi.co/admin don't work. Correct admin is teck@koh.one/admin

passed_tests: GET /api/showcase/banners - Returns seeded default banners (banner_demo_1, banner_demo_2, banner_demo_3 plus Monday synced banners)
GET /api/showcase/media-player - Returns seeded default media items (media_demo_1 through media_demo_4) with config
POST /api/admin/showcase/media-player/add-item - Add media item works correctly
DELETE /api/admin/showcase/media-player/items/{item_id} - Delete media item works correctly
BannerCarousel renders on landing page with seeded default content
MediaPlayer renders on landing page with seeded default content
Banner carousel navigation (arrows + dots) works correctly
Media player navigation (arrows + play/pause) works correctly
MosaicCommunityLanding layout order: BannerCarousel → Cultural Icons → MediaPlayer → MosaicGrid
Both components visible on mobile viewport (412x915)
action_items: Update documentation: admin credentials are teck@koh.one/admin, not admin@chipi.co/admin
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: BannerCarousel.jsx has DEFAULT_BANNERS constant and fallback logic in useEffect that sets defaults when API returns empty
VERIFIED: MediaPlayer.jsx has DEFAULT_MEDIA_ITEMS and DEFAULT_CONFIG constants with fallback logic
VERIFIED: showcase/__init__.py has seed_showcase_defaults() function that seeds demo banners and media items on startup
VERIFIED: main.py calls seed_showcase_defaults() during startup (line ~247-248)
VERIFIED: MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx correctly renders BannerCarousel, then cultural icons, then MediaPlayer, then MosaicGrid
All data-testid attributes present: banner-carousel, media-player, banner-next, banner-prev, media-next, media-prev

success_rate.frontend: 100% (BannerCarousel and MediaPlayer both rendering with fallback content)

test_credentials.note: admin@chipi.co credentials provided in request do not work

seed_data_creation: Backend seeds banner_demo_1, banner_demo_2, banner_demo_3 and media_demo_1 through media_demo_4 automatically on startup via seed_showcase_defaults()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Showcase fallback/default content feature fully tested and working. seed_showcase_defaults() function runs on startup and seeds default banners and media items if none exist. Frontend components have DEFAULT_BANNERS and DEFAULT_MEDIA_ITEMS constants that serve as fallbacks when API returns empty. Both safeguards work together to ensure the landing page never shows empty components. Admin auth uses teck@koh.one/admin with /api/auth-v2/login endpoint.

banner_carousel.fallback_logic: useEffect sets DEFAULT_BANNERS when API returns empty

media_player.fallback_logic: Sets DEFAULT_CONFIG when API returns empty
